ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and the day when it displays it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The day when it reveals his radiance,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and by the day as it displays the sun's glory,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: by the day when it brightens the earth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And by oath of the day when it reveals it
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: By the day as it Jallaha.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And the day when it shows it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and by the day when it displays him
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the day when it revealeth him,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and by the day as it reveals its glory
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: By the day when it glorifieth him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: by the day when it reveals her,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: By the Day as it shows up (the Sun's) glory;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And by the day as it shows up (the sun's) brightness;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: by the day, when it displays it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And the day as it reveals it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [by] the day when it displays it
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [91:3] and [by] the day when it reveals her, as it rises [high],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the day when it revealeth him,
